BreadcrumbDescription: Inarius has judged me, but what that means for my mission remains unclear. I must return to Reverend Mother Prava and hopefully gain the blessing necessary to travel beyond the Black Lake and pursue Lilith.
BreadcrumbHeader: Speak with Reverend Mother Prava in Kor Valar
Name: Light's Protection
Phase108Description: I found Reverend Mother Prava addressing the Cathedral of Light and Knights Penitent in Kor Valar. After she is finished, we must walk together to discuss the matter of her blessing and crossing the Black Lake to pursue Lilith.
Phase113Description: I stood before Inarius in the Alabaster Monastery and received his judgment. I must now return to Reverend Mother Prava in Kor Valar.
Phase76Description: I found Reverend Mother Prava addressing the Cathedral of Light and Knights Penitent in Kor Valar. After she is finished, we must walk together to discuss the matter of her blessing and crossing the Black Lake to pursue Lilith.
Phase97Description: I stood before Inarius in the Alabaster Monastery and received his judgment. I must now return to Reverend Mother Prava in Kor Valar.
Toast: Speak with Reverend Mother Prava in Kor Valar
